Welcome to peutzdesign, my personal site. I'm a self-taught digital designer working in Oregon, who believes that design is inseparable from usability; the two must complement each other. The tool is only as good as its weakest part. I strive to create strong, beautiful, and highly usable tools.
- Mike Peutz
